name: Mother's Tree Of Life Necklace - Gold
description:
After the popularity of the Mother's Tree of Life in silver we thought we'd introduce a gold version of this necklace.  It's a little more glammy, a little more sparkly for the fashionistas out there!

Liz, of Oie Jewelry takes the time to make sure each piece is carefully crafted with an artistic eye to detail.  Jewelry by Oie Jewelry has even graced the necks of famous mothers such as Julia Roberts.  
 
This quality 30" necklace is hand-made using genuine, fine quality gemstones and 14 k gold. It will be customized with your children's or grandchildren's birthstones.  Additional stones may be added in the future for a small fee of $10.00.  

After you place your order, contact us and let us know what the birth months needed are.   We will make sure your request gets to the artist. 

This product is handcrafted for each order.  Therefore, we require 1-2 weeks of handling time before shipping.  Because this is a custom-made item especially designed for you, it is a FINAL SALE, with no refunds available.

name: Velvet Plush Pumpkin Spring Set
description:
We saw these velvets and were immediately drawn to pair the vibrant coral with the pomegranate and melon to create a unique, yet beautiful pile of happiness. The Velvet Plush Pumpkin Spring Large set of 6 pumpkins includes a 6" Melon, 6" Coral, 5" Coral, 4" Pomegranate, 4" Melon, 2" Melon. Each velvet pumpkin is finished with a natural, organic stem.

Ships 1-2 weeks

name: NEW! Rustic Marquee Lights~Symbols
description:
These vintage inspired lights are the perfect way to personalize a room. The Heart is the perfect gift for a loved one, an arrow to point your guests in the right direction or a star to bling up any room!

Details: 24" tall, 4" deep
             Color will vary due to naturally occurring rust. 
             Artificial wear and tear is created on each letter. 
             Wear will vary from letter to letter.
             Lights included. C9 bulbs. 
             Plug into regular outlet. 
             Link up to 4 lights together!

Allow 2 weeks delivery.

name: 2013 HeartGram™ Set Lagoon/Turquoise
description:
The LoveFeast™ 2013 limited edition HeartGram™ Set is a special gift for any Valentine.  The 2013 HeartGram™ set comes with a custom designed postcard by artist Annie Barnett of Be Small Studio.  

Each HeartGram™ Set comes packaged in a kraft paper gift box, with crinkle paper and art card.  The box is tied with a gorgeous satin ribbon. The HeartGram™ postcard features a Valentine inspired rendering of a peacock feather and the hand-lettered words "so loved”.  Each postcard is printed on artist's premium cold press paper.  The postcard can be delivered blank for you to fill out for your Valentine, or you can leave a note to us upon ordering with you message and we will hand write the note for you. 
. 

This set contains an approximately 5" Lagoon and 4" Turquoise handcrafted Velvet Plush Heart HeartGram™, with an artistic, organic stem.

The collectible 2013 HeartGram™ is available only in 2013 through February 28th.

Ships within 1-2 weeks.

name: Velvet Plush Pumpkin LoveFeast Large Set
description:
This LoveFeast Large Set contains a bounty of our favorite plush velvet colors! The velvet Plush Pumpkin LoveFeast large set of 6 pumpkins includes a 6" Sage, 6" Acorn, 5" Mushroom, 4" Sangria, 4" Spice and 2" Stone.  Each pumpkin is finished with a natural, organic stem.

Will ship in 1 - 2 weeks.
